title: Choice Hotels Announces Expansion of Cambria hotels & suites in North Miami Beach, FL
text:
Choice Hotels International, Inc.
ROCKVILLE, Md. , Sept. 23, Choice Hotels International, Inc. (NYSE: CHH), one of the world's largest hotel companies, announced it has signed an agreement with franchise partner CGI Merchant Group and 163 rd St. Executive Center LLC to develop a new Cambria hotels & suites brand property in North Miami Beach, FL. The 165 room Cambria hotel will be located at the intersection of 163 rd St. and 19 th Ave and is expected to open in 2017.
"We continue to experience strong momentum in bringing the Cambria hotels & suites experience to new business and leisure travelers, and we're excited to announce our new hotel in North Miami Beach ," said Michael Murphy , senior vice president, Upscale Brands, Choice Hotels International. "This is a fantastic location with explosive growth, and we can't wait to bring our brand to travelers in this market."
"We are excited about our affiliation with the Choice Hotels Cambria brand," said Raoul Thomas CEO and founder of CGI Merchant Group, "I have been observing the growth in the North Miami Beach market for several years and Cambria will make a great addition, sitting at the juncture of two of Miami's strongest retail and residential areas in Aventura and Bal Harbor ."
Mr. Thomas expressed praises to Alejandro Araujo , principal of AFIN Developer Group for his efforts in assisting the execution of the Choice agreement. AFIN will play a role in the development of the 165 room hotel and 20,000 square feet of ground floor retail.
"The addition of the Cambria hotel & suites North Miami Beach property is an exciting addition to CGI's fast growing portfolio in South Florida and is consistent with CGI's strategy of partnering with top tier institutional partners," said Jeff Temple , senior partner at Morrison & Foerster LLP, counsel for CGI on this transaction and its entire commercial real estate portfolio. "This project will add 165 additional rooms to CGI's hotel portfolio, including its Me Miami project currently under construction in Downtown Miami , and will be a nice complement to its retail and office properties located throughout South Florida ."
The North Miami Beach area has become a popular destination because it offers something for everyone: beautiful beaches, fine dining, shopping destinations, hospitals and a robust business district. Beyond the obvious attractions for leisure travelers, North Miami Beach is also a popular choice for corporations, who see the eclectic city as a perfect meeting and conference destination to drive high attendance and satisfaction.
Designed as a business travel and leisure brand, all Cambria hotels are new-construction and feature a larger lobby to give guests a more social atmosphere; all-suite rooms that are larger than standard hotel rooms and include separate living, working and sleeping space; and the latest technology that allows guests to stay connected while they travel.
Like all Cambria hotels & suites, the North Miami Beach property will feature other fine amenities such as a contemporary bistro, Social Circle™, serving a menu comprised of local specialties created by Chef Michael DeMaria ; liquor, wine, beer and freshly prepared grab-and-go gourmet salads and sandwiches; and a barista bar. This property will also boast over 2,000 square feet of meeting space.
About Cambria hotels & suites
Cambria hotels & suites makes business travel easier-and more fun-than ever before. Offering modern decor, rooms that feel like an upgrade, and fresh, local cuisine at our Social Circle™ restaurant, Cambria makes every guest feel like a VIP. There are currently 24 properties open across the country and 25 under development in the U.S. and Canada . To learn more, visit www.cambriahotelsandsuites.com .
About Choice Hotels
Choice Hotels International, Inc.® (NYSE: CHH) is one of the world's largest lodging companies. With more than 6,300 hotels franchised in more than 35 countries and territories, we represent more than 500,000 rooms around the globe. As of June 30, 2015 , 613 hotels were in our development pipeline. Our company's Ascend Hotel Collection®, Cambria® hotels & suites, Comfort Inn®, Comfort Suites®, Sleep Inn®, Quality®, Clarion®, MainStay Suites®, Suburban Extended Stay Hotel®, Econo Lodge® and Rodeway Inn® brands provide a spectrum of lodging choices to meet guests' needs. With more than 23 million members and counting, check out our Choice Privileges® rewards program to see how you can reap the benefits of being a member of the Choice Hotels® family. All hotels are individually owned and operated. Visit us at www.choicehotels.com for more information.
About CGI Merchant Group
CGI Merchant Group (CGI) is a private equity asset management firm. Through strategic and effective investment management, CGI increases the value of its commercial real estate investments. The investments are converted into high-quality luxurious properties increasing asset value. CGI owns more than 400 thousand square feet of Class A real estate in South Florida . Founded in 2006 by Raoul Thomas , CGI has offices in Miami , New York and Chicago .
